headline: A Look At Expedia Group (EXPE) Valuation After Strong Fourth Quarter Beat And Growing B2B Optimism
summary: Expedia Group (EXPE) is back in focus after strong fourth quarter results, with revenue and bookings ahead of expectations and fresh interest from institutional investors and research desks despite some caution around margin guidance. See our latest analysis for Expedia Group. At a share price of US$215.69, Expedia Group has seen a 6% 7 day share price return after a roughly 19% 30 day share price decline and a softer 90 day patch. Meanwhile, the 1 year total shareholder return of 9.84% and...
